com.contentful.java.cda.image

Enum ImageOption.Resize

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ImageOption.Resize>
      • com.contentful.java.cda.image.ImageOption.Resize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ImageOption.Resize>
    Enclosing class:
    ImageOption

    public static enum ImageOption.Resize
extends java.lang.Enum<ImageOption.Resize>
    Defines the type of resizing possible.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      crop
      Crop a part of the original image to match the specified size.
      fill
      Crop the image to the specified dimensions, upscaling if source image is smaller.
      pad
      Adds padding so that the generated image has the specified dimensions.
      scale
      Scale the image regardless of the original aspect ratio.
      thumb
      Creates a thumbnail from the image based on a focus area, if ImageOption.focusOn(Focus).

    • Method Summary

      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
